column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We took our time with the exhibit then zipped through the rest of the museum
column2: stopping here and there to admire famous works like "American Gothic
column4: and A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte"; we gawked at what seemed like whole roomfuls of Monet and Renoir. The collection was vast and impressive
column5: and we probably needed to allocate more time to do it any justice. Still
column6: I felt properly enriched by our short visit
column7: and I hope to come back to this museum some other leisurely trip to Chicago.
